input_text.Prompt:
Using the item specifications and item name, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Item name:
Disney Black 3d Stitch Silicone Soft Case Cover for Samsung Galaxy Nexus I9250 I515 NEW

Item specifications:
Made with high quality Silicone
Durable Protection
Very Good hand feeling
Compatible with: samsung Galaxy Nexus i9250
Samsung Galaxy Nexus i515
input_text.Response A: Disney fans, your favorite character is here to cheer up your phone.  This high-quality, soft silicone case, decorated with Stitch's cheeky image in 3D gives you a durable, yet comfortable to hold way to protect your Samsung Galaxy Nexus.
input_text.Response B: Protect your phone with style through this Protector Case. Provides protection and a new look to your phone. The material is hard and durable, and has very good hand feeling. The case is compatible with: Samsung Galaxy Nexus i9250.

label_annotations.factors_a: i think this response follows the aida framework as a better quality response and is catchy.
label_annotations.factors_b: the response was good but was more formal so i lowered the score for this response.
